[3 Similar Discussions Found](//www.whattoexpect.com/search?tab=community&q=Ollipop) I wouldn't worry too much about just one. Almost everything is cumulative. I've been staying away from almost all herbal things just because there haven't been many studies on the safety of them. So hard to avoid everything though! Drank one last week as well so just googled it too hahah. IDK, there are so many weird/not great ingredients in a lot of foods we humans in general eat...I wouldn't worry about it! It was fine tasting to me but I think I prefer Spindrift! And an occasional Diet Coke - can't imagine Olipop is worse lol, just different "risks"/unknowns of the ingredients Bump I wouldn't worry. Pregnant moms prior to the 90s drank and smoke throughout pregnancy. this is a terrible comparison. It does matter. Drinking and smoking led to a ton of health issues. It wasn't harmless. I did the same thing but I had drank 4 or 5 in the course of my pregnancy! I felt so guilty and worried after googling. Everything is all good with me and baby tho :) I've just stopped drinking them since reading up on them! Risky how? I'm curious because on their website it says they are safe for all.
